targets.query:
from(bucket: "bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "readings")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "X_Overall")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["deviceName"] == "Sensor001")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "readings")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Y_Overall")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["deviceName"] == "Sensor001")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "longterm_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "readings")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "X_Overall" or r["_field"] == "Y_Overall" or r["_field"] == "Z_Overall")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["deviceName"] == "Sensor001")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
